title: RIOT CAN YOU PLEASE EXPLAIN THIS?
body: RITO can you please explain why I didn't get an S+ on this match? Not only am I saving the environment, by prevents trees from dying, but I am also playing the role of a true support. Giving kills over to the carries, unless my life was absolutely on the line.

replies.body: [Do I get another 2 mastery levels? haha](http://imgur.com/a/TeQcg)
One time i went 12/0/38 as Support Lulu with almost 90% Kill participation and got a D- for it.

You never got any items (since you didn't die), so your numbers were really low. Just because you were around for an assist doesn't mean you contributed much. Mastery grades are not about how high a KDA you can get.
I understand this. It's a joke.
Then it's on the wrong board.
Not enough kills or cs gg
Because you did absolutely nothing useful in this game.
